title: I learned something neat today watching Dyrus's stream
body:
He was playing Lee Sin, ward W'd behind Illaoi and attempted to ult as said Illaoi was mid-ult herself into a turret.

Apparently Illaoi is immune to displacement CC mid ult, so it was like he kicked a tree and then met a terrible fate... cuz well she ulted.

...

Why the heck is Illaoi immune to displacement CC mid-ult?
